text: 12.8: FG 15.32; 20.28; 2 Ko 9.7; 1 Pi 5.2Maaŋ muuŋgip, Fhe Bakɨme guma mbe ana wo ŋaara muun zav harigi gumgi ndavi gu ndɨkndɨgi havharɨrga ndɨkndɨga ana nɨɨŋgi, ana guigira mba ŋaarar muuŋv, harigi gumgi ndavi gu ndɨkndɨgi havharɨri. Guma, ana bigi sosuagi gumgi, ana bigɨr mben kurkurigi, ana bigi vhɨrvera mben nɨɨŋri. Guma, ana ŋaara the ganɨv, ana guigira tuituigip mba ŋaara ganɨri. Guma, ana harigi ntɨɨri kora mbuav mben kurkurigi, ana ndikndigɨp mben kurkurari.
